knimeNode.name: JSONPath
knimeNode.shortDescription: Selects certain paths from the selected JSON column.

intro.p: JSONPath is a similar to XPath alternative for JSON.
It has two notations, dot-notation:$.repository[3].content and bracket-notation: $['repository'][3]['content']

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: The JSON column to select the paths from
When checked, the source column will be removed

The expected result type. (If something is found at that path and cannot convert to the expected type missing value is returned. If not found, missing value will be returned. You can set the date details you want to keep.)

option.name: Return the paths instead of values

tab.option: When checked, the paths found for the JSONPath will be returned (as Strings) as a list for each row, not the values referenced by the JSONPath.
When checked the result column will have a collection type.
